title: Abecean Longfin
collected_by: Collected by catching Abacean Longfin fish.

title: Ancestor Moth Wing [DG]
collected_by: Collected by catching Ancestor Moths.

title: Ash Creep Cluster [DB]
collected_by: Harvested from creep cluster plants unique to Solstheim.

title: Ash Hopper Jelly [DB]
collected_by: Collected from dead ash hoppers.

title: Ashen Grass Pod [DB]
collected_by: Harvested from spiky grass plants unique to Solstheim.

title: Bear Claws
collected_by: Collected from various types of dead Bears.

title: Bee
collected_by: Collected from beehives and by catching Bees.

title: Beehive Husk
collected_by: Collected from beehives.

title: Bleeding Crown
collected_by: Harvested from Bleeding Crown, a mushroom found in various caves.

title: Blisterwort
collected_by: Harvested from Blisterwort mushrooms found in various caves.

title: Blue Butterfly Wing
collected_by: Collected by catching Blue Butterflies. Often found during daylight hours near flowering plants.

title: Blue Dartwing
collected_by: Collected by catching Dragonflies found near rivers and streams below the snow line.

title: Blue Mountain Flower
collected_by: Harvested from the blue variety of Mountain Flower, found throughout Skyrim.

title: Boar Tusk [DB]
collected_by: Collected from dead bristlebacks and rieklings.

title: Bone Meal
collected_by: Collected from undead such as skeletons, and Draugr.

title: Briar Heart
collected_by: Collected from Forsworn Briarhearts.

title: Burnt Spriggan Wood [DB]
collected_by: Collected from dead burnt spriggans.

title: Butterfly Wing
collected_by: Collected from catching Monarch Butterflies. Often found during daylight hours near flowering plants.

title: Canis Root
collected_by: Harvested from Canis Root, found in The Rift and Hjaalmarch.

title: Charred Skeever Hide
collected_by: Food, collected from dead Skeevers found on roasting spits.

title: Chaurus Eggs
collected_by: Collected from Chaurus Egg Sacs, found in Falmer caves.

title: Chaurus Hunter Antennae [DG]
collected_by: Collected from dead Chaurus Hunters and Chaurus Hunter Fledglings.

title: Chicken's Egg
collected_by: Food, harvested from Chicken nests in various farms.

title: Creep Cluster
collected_by: Harvested from Creep Cluster, found in the volcanic tundra of Eastmarch.

title: Crimson Nirnroot
collected_by: Harvested from Crimson Nirnroot, found in Blackreach, needed for the quest A Return To Your Roots.

title: Cyrodilic Spadetail
collected_by: Collected by catching Cyrodilic Spadetail fish.

title: Daedra Heart
collected_by: Collected from dead Dremora.

title: Deathbell
collected_by: Harvested from Deathbell, found in Hjaalmarch. Needed for the quests Few and Far Between and The Only Cure.

title: Dragon's Tongue
collected_by: Harvested from Dragon's Tongue, found in the volcanic tundra of Eastmarch.

title: Dwarven Oil
collected_by: Collected from destroyed Dwarven Automatons, found in Dwarven Ruins.

title: Ectoplasm
collected_by: Collected from undead Ghosts.

title: Elves Ear
collected_by: Harvested from Dried Elves Ear bunches found in homes and camps.

title: Emperor Parasol Moss [DB]
collected_by: Harvested from emperor parasol moss plants near Tel Mithryn.

title: Eye of Sabre Cat
collected_by: Collected from dead Sabre Cats.

title: Falmer Ear
collected_by: Collected from dead Falmer.

title: Felsaad Tern Feathers [DB]
collected_by: Collected from dead Felsaad terns.

title: Fire Salts
collected_by: Collected from dead Flame Atronachs, a type of daedra. Needed for the quest Stoking the Flames.

title: Fly Amanita
collected_by: Harvested from Fly Amanita mushrooms, found in various caves.

title: Frost Mirriam
collected_by: Harvested from Dried Frost Mirriam bunches found in homes and camps.

title: Frost Salts
collected_by: Collected from dead Frost Atronachs, a type of daedra. One is needed for the quest Dravynea's Frost Salts.

title: Garlic
collected_by: Food. Can also be harvested from Garlic Braids.

title: Giant Lichen
collected_by: Harvested from Giant Lichen, found in Hjaalmarch.

title: Giant's Toe
collected_by: Collected from dead Giants, which can be found in Giant Camps.

title: Gleamblossom [DG]
collected_by: Harvested from the plant of the same name.

title: Glow Dust
collected_by: Collected from dead Wisps and Wispmothers.

title: Glowing Mushroom
collected_by: Harvested from Glowing Mushrooms, found in various caves.

title: Grass Pod
collected_by: Harvested from Spiky Grass, found in northern regions of Skyrim.

title: Hagraven Claw
collected_by: Collected from dead Hagravens.

title: Hagraven Feathers
collected_by: Collected from dead Hagravens. Can also be found scattered around their sleeping areas.

title: Hanging Moss
collected_by: Harvested from Hanging Moss.

title: Hawk Beak
collected_by: Collected from dead Hawks.

title: Hawk Feathers
collected_by: Collected from dead Hawks.

title: Hawk's Egg [HF]
collected_by: Harvested from Hawk nests.

title: Histcarp
collected_by: Collected by catching Histcarp fish.

title: Honeycomb
collected_by: Food. Collected from beehives.

title: Human Flesh
collected_by: Cannot be harvested or collected; with the Dawnguard add-on installed, several respawning samples can be found in Volkihar Keep.

title: Human Heart
collected_by: Cannot be harvested or collected; limited number of samples available.

title: Ice Wraith Teeth
collected_by: Collected from Ice Wraiths. Needed for the quest Ice Cold.

title: Imp Stool
collected_by: Harvested from Imp Stool mushrooms, found in various caves.

title: Jazbay Grapes
collected_by: Harvested from Jazbay vines, found in the volcanic tundra of Eastmarch. Needed for the quest Smooth Jazbay.

title: Juniper Berries
collected_by: Harvested from Juniper shrubs, common in The Reach. Needed for the quest Elmus Favor Quest.

title: Large Antlers
collected_by: Collected from dead male Elk.

title: Lavender
collected_by: Harvested from Lavender, most common in Whiterun Hold.

title: Luna Moth Wing
collected_by: Collected by catching Luna Moths. Often found near flowers after dark.

title: Moon Sugar
collected_by: Cannot be collected or harvested. Can be purchased from the Khajiit Traders.

title: Mora Tapinella
collected_by: Harvested from Mora Tapinella mushrooms, found growing on dead trees.

title: Mudcrab Chitin
collected_by: Collected from dead Mudcrabs, found in or near bodies of water.

title: Namira's Rot
collected_by: Harvested from Namira's Rot mushrooms, found in various caves.

title: Netch Jelly [DB]
collected_by: Collected from dead netch.

title: Nightshade
collected_by: Harvested from Nightshade, found growing throughout Skyrim. Needed for the quest Few and Far Between.

title: Nirnroot
collected_by: Harvested from Nirnroot, found near bodies of water throughout Skyrim. Needed for the quest Few and Far Between.

title: Nordic Barnacle
collected_by: Harvested from Nordic Barnacle Clusters, found in or near water.

title: Orange Dartwing
collected_by: Collected by catching Dragonflies found near rivers and streams below the snow line.

title: Pearl
collected_by: Cannot be harvested or collected in the original version of the game; only readily available after the Merchant perk has been unlocked. With Dragonborn, they can be harvested from Pearl Oysters in Solstheim.

title: Pine Thrush Egg
collected_by: Harvested from bird nests in forested regions, in particular The Rift.

title: Poison Bloom [DG]
collected_by: Harvested from the plant of the same name.

title: Powdered Mammoth Tusk
collected_by: Cannot be harvested or collected; only readily available after the Merchant perk has been unlocked.

title: Purple Mountain Flower
collected_by: Harvested from the purple variety of Mountain Flower.

title: Red Mountain Flower
collected_by: Harvested from the red variety of Mountain Flower.

title: River Betty
collected_by: Collected by catching River Betty fish.

title: Rock Warbler Egg
collected_by: Harvested from bird nests in rocky regions, in particular The Reach.

title: Sabre Cat Tooth
collected_by: Collected from dead Sabre cats.

title: Salmon Roe [HF]
collected_by: Harvested from jumping Salmon.

title: Salt Pile
collected_by: Food. Cannot be harvested or collected, but is commonly found in barrels and sacks.

title: Scaly Pholiota
collected_by: Harvested from Scaly Pholiota mushrooms, found growing on dead trees.

title: Scathecraw [DB]
collected_by: Harvested from scathecraw plants.

title: Silverside Perch
collected_by: Collected by catching Silverside Perch fish.

title: Skeever Tail
collected_by: Collected from dead Skeevers.

title: Slaughterfish Egg
collected_by: Collected from Slaughterfish Egg Nests, found in or near water.

title: Slaughterfish Scales
collected_by: Collected from dead Slaughterfish.

title: Small Antlers
collected_by: Collected from dead female Elk.

title: Small Pearl
collected_by: Cannot be harvested or collected in the original version of the game; only readily available after the Merchant perk has been unlocked. With Dragonborn, they can be harvested from Pearl Oysters in Solstheim.

title: Snowberries
collected_by: Harvested from Snowberry bushes, found in snowy regions of Skyrim.

title: Spawn Ash [DB]
collected_by: Collected from dead ash spawn.

title: Spider Egg
collected_by: Collected from spider Egg Sacs and Web Sacs.

title: Spriggan Sap
collected_by: Cannot be harvested or collected; best source is merchants.

collected_by: Collected from dead Spriggans.

collected_by: Harvested from Thistle.

title: Vampire Dust
collected_by: Collected from dead Vampires.
